episode.title: Mackey v. Lanier Collection Agency & Service, Inc.

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 86-1387, Mackey against Lanier Collection Agency will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: We have filed an opinion in this case affirming the judgment of the Supreme Court of Georgia.
Justice Kennedy has filed a dissenting opinion and Justices Blackmun, O'Connor and Scalia have joined that opinion.
